titleStmt.title: The speech of Sir George Pudsey Knight. at the time of his being sworn recorder of the city of Oxford, in the Council-chamber of the same city, on Tuesday the eight [sic] day of January 1683/4 where they agreed to the sealing the instrument sent by His Majesty. / Order'd by act of Council, that Sir George Pudsey Knight, be desired to print his speech. Baker.
titleStmt.author: Pudsey, George, Sir, b. 1664?

titleStmt.title: The speech of Sir George Pudsey Knight. at the time of his being sworn recorder of the city of Oxford, in the Council-chamber of the same city, on Tuesday the eight [sic] day of January 1683/4 where they agreed to the sealing the instrument sent by His Majesty. / Order'd by act of Council, that Sir George Pudsey Knight, be desired to print his speech. Baker.
titleStmt.author: Pudsey, George, Sir, b. 1664?
Oxford (England). Council.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with some loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
